FuncDef: The reset slot command resets a board or subcard in a specified slot.

ParaDef.Info:
Resets a board in a specified slot.
The value is a string of 1 to 30 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

Resets a subcard in a specified slot.
The value is a string of 1 to 30 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

Examples: Caution!!! Confirm to reset slot 1! Continue? [Y/N]:y
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
When a board or subcard on a device is running abnormally, run the reset slot slot-id [ card card-id ] command to reset the board or subcard.
Configuration Impact
When the board CPU is powered on, the main control board can be reset. If the slave main control board exists on the device, the device automatically performs a master/slave switchover after the reset slot command is run.
Precautions
The reset slot command can only be used when the board or subcard is running.
Before the board or subcard is reset, save important data in advance.
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
